content.question:
​

The x axis ranges from 0 to 6 in increments of 1. 

The y axis ranges from negative 2 to 2 in increments of 1.

The curve enters at (0.1 comma negative 2.5).

The curve goes up and to the right, passing through the x axis at (1 comma 0).

The curve continues up and to the right, passing through (4 comma 1).

The curve continues up and to the right to approximately (6.5 comma 1.3).

​The graph of the function <math alttext="y equals f open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given. Which of the following points is on the graph of <math alttext="y equals f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
